signSucceed.registerContent: Your account has been registered successfully, and we have automatically logged you into TalexTouch.
signSucceed.loginContent: Your account has been logged in successfully, and you can now start enjoying TalexTouch.

emailVerify.content: We have sent a verification email to your mailbox, please enter the email verification code.

account.remoteFail: Unable to connect to the remote server!

themePreference.Default: Embrace the familiar comfort of the default window style.
themePreference.Mica: Immerse yourself in a mesmerizing, real-time glass-like background adorned with a delightful noise texture!
themePreference.Filter: Delight in a window background featuring a captivating tracked-blur modal wallpaper that adds a touch of elegance to your screen.

settingHeader.subTitle: The command bar, reimagined for those who build.

settingTools.searchEngineLogsDesc: Enable detailed logging for search engine operations to help debug search issues.

settingUser.groupDesc: Manage your account information and login status.

applicationEmpty.title: Choose an application to configure.
applicationEmpty.description: Unleash the power of app customization to tailor your digital space. Fine-tune settings to optimize workflow and seamlessly share configurations via a personal cloud. Explore diverse setups for inspiration and insights. Ready to create your perfect workspace? Select an app to begin.

agreement.title: Agreement
agreement.description: Please review and accept the terms below to proceed.

download.title: Download Center
download.cancel_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to cancel this download task?
download.clear_history_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to clear all completed download history? This action cannot be undone.
download.remove_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to remove this task from the list?

download.clear_history_item_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to clear this history record?
download.clear_all_history_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to clear all history records? This action cannot be undone.

settingDownload.groupDesc: Configure download behavior and storage options
settingDownload.autoAdjustDesc: Automatically adjust concurrent downloads based on network conditions
settingDownload.networkAwareDesc: Adapt download behavior based on network quality
settingDownload.priorityBasedDesc: Prioritize high-priority tasks over low-priority ones
settingDownload.chunkSizeDesc: Size of each download chunk for large files
settingDownload.enableResumeDesc: Support resuming interrupted downloads from where they left off
settingDownload.maxRetriesDesc: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed chunks
settingDownload.historyRetentionDesc: How long to keep download history records
settingDownload.autoCleanupDesc: Automatically clean up temporary files after downloads complete
settingDownload.timeoutDesc: Maximum time to wait for network responses
settingDownload.retryDelayDesc: Wait time before retrying a failed request
settingDownload.networkMaxRetriesDesc: Maximum number of network-level retry attempts
settingDownload.actionsDesc: Manage download settings and temporary files

channels.title: Channel Manager

channels.manageDesc: Connect OpenAI, DeepSeek, Siliconflow and more.
channels.auditDesc: Review invocation history and logs across channels.

capabilities.auditDesc: Track execution logs and performance metrics.

future.title: Cloud & Sharing
future.desc: Cloud download, target sharing and more are on the roadmap.

settingUpdate.groupDesc: Choose your update channel and how often to check for new builds.

settingUpdate.frequencyDesc: Automatic polling interval after the app starts.

status.updateAvailable: A new version is available. See the popup dialog.

settingUpdate.actionsDesc: Trigger update checks or maintenance tasks.

window.closeToTrayDesc: Hide window instead of quitting when clicking close button

setup.accessibilityDesc: Required to scan applications and provide search features

setup.showTrayDesc: Display app icon in system tray
setup.hideDockDesc: Hide Dock icon after closing main window (macOS only)
setup.startSilentDesc: Launch application without showing window, run in background only
setup.runAsAdminDesc: Run elevated on Windows to unlock system-level tasks.
setup.customDesktopDesc: Enable the experimental Linux desktop integration (Beta).
